Articles.Content: A while back in spring I bought Kerbal Space Program for my PC. Unfortunately my PC could not handle it and after 2 days, 5 hours of play, 24 crashes, 3 kraken attacks, and weird glitches I decided that my Windows Vista PC could not handle it. But, I decided to give the demo a try. It worked perfectly (and i am glad it did.) So, I was wondering if there was any mods for the demo. Don't get me wrong i am glad there is a demo, however after playing for a few hours and going to the mun there is nothing left to do. If there are any mods for the demo please let me know, and continue making what I think is a great game.
The demo is designed to not support addons at all, the most you can do is a one-for-one replacement of an existing part, and there's no plugin support.

Unfortunately for you, the demo is hardcoded to only recognize the parts it comes with. Though the last version before the paid release (0.13.3 was it?) does have a few old mods floating around for it.

The full game is under active development, it's a few versions on since last spring.

If you are very limited on RAM (eg 2 GB) you can delete some of the stock parts.
As well as looking for 13.3 ill try to delete some parts and see if that works. Thanks for the support!
